_header: I saw a sight that was unsure
_description: A song of impossibilities against faithlessness in women: ‘Lemman whan þe song is soþ / Of loue þou ssalt be trewe’ — 24 lines

WestmAb343.First Lines:
I sei a sicte þat was vnseireA findels þat was vre
                    frendeA wis woman of wit vn sleiA los man faste
                    binde…
WestmAb343.Last Lines:
…Leman whan þe song is soþOf loue þou ssalt be
                    Trewe
